arm_group.description: Patients with Wolman disease (WD), Cholesteryl Ester Storage Disease (CESD), or Lysosomal acid lipase (LAL) deficiency.

biospec_descr.textblock:
No biospecimens will be collected specifically for this study.  However, participants are
      encouraged to send left over biopsy material to the study site for analysis at a later date.

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study are: to characterize and understand the natural history of disease
      progression in WD and CESD, and to provide historical controls for WD and CESD for
      developing clinical treatment trials. The hypothesis is that the variability and clinical
      progression in WD and CESD is large and represents a continuum of severities from a lethal
      infantile to near normal adults with only "fatty livers".

clinical_study.brief_title: Wolman/CESD Natural History Chart Review and Longitudinal Follow-Up

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a single institution historical cohort study of patients with Wolman (WD) or
      Cholesteryl Ester Storage Disease (CESD).  Retrospective data will be collected and
      abstracted from the medical records of both living and deceased patients.  Additionally
      prospective data from living patients will be collected and abstracted annually until the
      end of the study.  Literature sources will be used as secondary source data and will be
      screened to minimize/eliminate duplicative reports.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  male or female of any age;

          -  a clinical diagnosis of WD or CESD as defined by:

               -  documented LAL enzyme deficiency OR

               -  LAL gene mutations OR

               -  a clinical course and tissue biopsy consistent with CESD or WD;

          -  written informed consent

study_pop.textblock:
Patients will be recruited initially from the PIs patient population.  Other physicians
        may refer their patients to this study for inclusion.

intervention.intervention_name: There are no interventions in this study.

clinical_study.official_title: A Historical Chart Review and Longitudinal Follow-Up of Identified Patients With Wolman Disease or Cholesteryl Ester Storage Disease, Lysosomal Acid Lipase Deficiency

primary_outcome.description: Measurement of the effect over time of LAL deficiency on the liver, spleen, intestines, lungs and adrenals will be performed using ultrasound imaging.  Measurement using ultrasound imaging will only be completed if clinically indicated during clinical-care patient visits.
primary_outcome.measure: Change in Organ Measurements using Ultrasound Imaging

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of the effect over time of LAL deficiency on the liver, spleen, intestines, lungs and adrenals will be performed using X-rays.  Measurement using X-ray imaging will only be completed if clinically indicated during clinical-care patient visits.
secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Organ Measurements using X-Ray Imaging

secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of the effect over time of LAL deficiency on the liver, spleen, intestines, lungs and adrenals will be performed using Computerized Tomography.  Measurement using Computerized Tomography imaging will only be completed if clinically indicated during clinical-care patient visits.
secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Organ Measurements using Computerized Tomography

secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of the effect over time of LAL deficiency on the liver, spleen, intestines, lungs and adrenals will be performed using Magnetic Resonance Imaging.  Measurement using Magnetic Resonance Imaging will only be completed if clinically indicated during clinical-care patient visits.
secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Organ Measurements using Magnetic Resonance Imaging

secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of the effect over time of LAL deficiency on the liver will be performed using standardized laboratory liver function assessments during clinical-care visits.
secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Liver Function using Standardized Laboratory Liver Function Assessment

secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of the effect over time of LAL deficiency on the lungs will be performed using standardized pulmonary function assessment during clinical care visits. Measurement using standardized pulmonary function assessment will only be completed if clinically indicated during clinical-care patient visits.
secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Pulmonary Function using Standardized Pulmonary Function Assessment

secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of the effect over time of LAL deficiency on the subject's physical health status will be performed using clinical physical exams during clinical-care visits.
secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Subjects's Overall Health Status using Clinical Exam

secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of the effect over time of LAL deficiency on the subject's overall health status will be performed using patient's or parents' verbal report during clinical-care visits.
secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the Subject's Overall Health Status using Verbal Report

collaborator.agency: National Center for Advancing Translational Science (NCATS)
National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke (NINDS)
National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases (NIDDK)
